Sentencas: Oxygen non-stoichiometry ofLa(0.8)Sr(0.2)Sc(y)Mn(1-y)O(3 +/-delta) (y = 0.2, 0.3, 0.4) oxide was studied by coulometric titration as a function of oxygen partial pressure, p(O-2), and temperature in a range of 923-1023 K.
Titulo: Oxidation-reduction behavior of La0.8Sr0.2ScyMn1-yO3±δ (y=0.2, 0.3, 0.4): Defect structure, thermodynamic and electrical properties

Sentencas: Depending on the Sc doping amount, p(O-2), and temperature, oxygen non-stoichiometry varies significantly.
Titulo: Oxidation-reduction behavior of La0.8Sr0.2ScyMn1-yO3±δ (y=0.2, 0.3, 0.4): Defect structure, thermodynamic and electrical properties

Sentencas: Under a reducing condition, La0.8Sr0.2ScyMn1-yO3 +/-delta shows both oxygen excess and oxygen deficient compositions.
Titulo: Oxidation-reduction behavior of La0.8Sr0.2ScyMn1-yO3±δ (y=0.2, 0.3, 0.4): Defect structure, thermodynamic and electrical properties

Sentencas: At the higher p(O-2) region, the oxygen excess composition is due to metal ion vacancies, whereas in the lower p(O-2) region, the oxygen deficient composition is due to the formation of oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Oxidation-reduction behavior of La0.8Sr0.2ScyMn1-yO3±δ (y=0.2, 0.3, 0.4): Defect structure, thermodynamic and electrical properties

Sentencas: The experimental data were analyzed by a random defect model.
Titulo: Oxidation-reduction behavior of La0.8Sr0.2ScyMn1-yO3±δ (y=0.2, 0.3, 0.4): Defect structure, thermodynamic and electrical properties

Sentencas: Partial molar enthalpy and partial molar entropy of oxygen vacancy formation are calculated using the Gibbs-Helmholtz equation from the non-stoichiometric data.
Titulo: Oxidation-reduction behavior of La0.8Sr0.2ScyMn1-yO3±δ (y=0.2, 0.3, 0.4): Defect structure, thermodynamic and electrical properties

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity was measured as the function of the oxygen partial pressure and temperature.
Titulo: Oxidation-reduction behavior of La0.8Sr0.2ScyMn1-yO3±δ (y=0.2, 0.3, 0.4): Defect structure, thermodynamic and electrical properties

Sentencas: In the lower p(O-2) region, electrical conductivity strongly depends on the oxygen non-stoichiometry.
Titulo: Oxidation-reduction behavior of La0.8Sr0.2ScyMn1-yO3±δ (y=0.2, 0.3, 0.4): Defect structure, thermodynamic and electrical properties
